H0.text: What type of dance shoe has a specially hardened sole or attached metal plates. Tap Shoe

H1.text: What type of dance shoe has a specially hardened sole or attached metal plates. Ballroom Shoe

H2.text: What type of dance shoe has a specially hardened sole or attached metal plates. Jazz Shoe

H3.text: What type of dance shoe has a specially hardened sole or attached metal plates. Hoofer

A8.text: Pointe shoes, for instance, are designed for ballet dancing, featuring a stiffened toe box and hardened sole to allow dancers to stand on the tips of their toes.

A9.text: The sound is made by shoes that have a metal 'tap' on the heel and toe.

A10.text: The screws are driven into a soundboard – a thin fiberboard integrated into the sole that can be firmly 'gripped' by the screws – to reliably attach the tap to the shoe.
